item.title: Coupon for Samsung TV give 10%
item.dc:creator: handynaijaadmin
item.description: Every hour, one lucky customer will get 100% cashback on Delhi metro card recharge. Promocode can only be used once per card number. Promocode can be used 3 times per user. Cashback is credited within 24 hours of the transaction into user’s Paytm Wallet. How to use Coupon functions of Rehub
item.content:encoded:
• Every hour, one lucky customer will get 100% cashback on Delhi metro card recharge.
  • Promocode can only be used once per card number.
  • Promocode can be used 3 times per user.
  • Cashback is credited within 24 hours of the transaction into user’s Paytm Wallet.

How to use Coupon functions of Rehub

item.title: Get flat 25% off on orders of $22 & above on paying with SBI credit

item.description: Get flat 25% off on orders of $1499 & above on paying with SBI credit/debit cards. Maximum discount is $500. Not valid on discounted products. How to use Coupon functions of Rehub
